title: ContextFusion and Bootstrap: An Effective Approach to Improve Slot Attention-Based Object-Centric Learning
summary: This paper introduces ContextFusion and Bootstrap to improve slot attention-based object-centric learning by addressing the lack of high-level semantic information and leveraging relationships to understand the environment.
usefulness_reason: Score 60 assigned because the title 'ContextFusion' and the summary's mention of 'relationships to understand the environment' and 'high-level semantic information' suggest a focus on contextual understanding, making it relevant to 'Contextual dataset'.
